com.esri.mo2.client.io
Class EsrimapCookieLink

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.client.io.EsrimapCookieLink
public class EsrimapCookieLink
extends Object

This class implements methods that are used to receive XML and binary data using Esrimap version 3.x cookie communication protocol.

          Sole constructor.

          Reads the byte data returned as response from the Application Server.
 void removeAllRawData()
          Removes all byte data from the current vector, and thus prepares it to receive a fresh request.

          Sends the cookie data request in the form of raw bytes to the Application Server.

Adds the given data bytes to a vector. This data will be sent as a request to the Application Server.

readResponse

public boolean readResponse()
                     throws IOException
